pageProps.pageTitle: Watch Attack on Titan Streaming Online | Hulu (Free Trial)

components.title: Attack on Titan
components.description: From the director of Death Note comes Attack on Titan. Many years ago, humanity was forced to retreat behind the towering walls of a fortified city to escape the massive, man-eating Titans that roamed the land outside their fortress. This is their story.
headline: 4 seasons available (175 episodes)
components.trailerName: Attack on Titan Final Season Part 2 - PV 2

items.name: (Dub) To You, in 2000 Years / The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1
items.description: After 100 years of peace, humanity is suddenly reminded of the terror of being at the Titans' mercy.

items.name: (Sub) To You, in 2000 Years/The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1
items.description: After 100 years of peace, humanity is suddenly reminded of the terror of being at the Titans' mercy.

items.name: (Dub) Beast Titan
items.description: Coupled with the military's cover up of a previous incident, the shocking discovery inside the wall causes a stir. Elsewhere, while the new Scout recruits are held for observation, a surprising threat appears.

items.name: (Sub) Beast Titan
items.description: Coupled with the military's cover-up of a previous incident, the shocking discovery inside the wall causes a stir. Elsewhere, while the new Scout recruits are held for observation, a surprising threat appears.

items.name: (Dub) Smoke Signal
items.description: Eren recovers and undergoes testing on his Titan abilities; the scouts learn a threat from within the government may destroy their operation.

items.name: (Sub) Smoke Signal
items.description: After barely surviving Eren's recovery, a rising threat from the shadows puts everyone's lives in danger again.

items.name: (Dub) The Other Side of the Sea
items.description: As Marley battles the Mid-East Alliance to end a four-year war, a group of Warrior candidates on the front lines compete to be the successor of the Armored Titan.

items.name: (Sub) The Other Side of the Sea
items.description: As Marley battles the Mid-East Alliance to end a four-year war, a group of Warrior candidates on the front lines compete to be the successor of the Armored Titan.

items.name: (Dub) That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2
items.description: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2: After the Titans break through the wall, the citizens of Shiganshina must run for their lives. Those that do make it to safety find a harsh life waiting for them, however.

items.name: (Sub) That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2
items.description: After the Titans break through the wall, the citizens of Shiganshina must run for their lives. Those that do make it to safety find a harsh life waiting for them, however.

items.name: (Dub) I'm Home
items.description: With the appearance of Titans within Wall Rose, Sasha and Conny ride as messengers to warn their villages of the impending threat.

items.name: (Sub) I'm Home
items.description: With the appearance of Titans within Wall Rose, Sasha and Conny ride as messengers to warn their villages of the impending threat.

items.name: (Dub) Pain
items.description: The Scouts take a stand against a new enemy, but it's not just Titans they'll be fighting anymore.

items.name: (Sub) Pain
items.description: The Scouts take a stand against a new enemy, but it's not just Titans they'll be fighting anymore.

items.name: (Dub) Midnight Train
items.description: Though glad the war is over, both the Eldian Warriors and Marley brass realize that neither have a future unless they finish the job of retaking the Founding Titan.

items.name: (Sub) Midnight Train
items.description: Though glad the war is over, both the Eldian Warriors and Marley brass realize that neither have a future unless they finish the job of retaking the Founding Titan.

items.name: (Dub) A Dim Light Amid Despair: Humanity's Comeback, Part 1
items.description: Dim Light Amid Despair: Humanity's Comeback, Part 1, A: Eren begins his training with the Cadet Corps, but questions about his painful past overwhelm him. When he struggles with a maneuvering exercise, Berholt and Reiner offer kindly advice.

items.name: (Sub) A Dim Light Amid Despair / Humanity's Comeback, Part 1
items.description: Eren begins his training with the Cadet Corps, but questions about his painful past overwhelm him. When he struggles with a maneuvering exercise, Berholt and Reiner offer kindly advice.

items.name: (Dub) Southwestward
items.description: The Scouts search for a hole in the wall while Eren and the others learn that someone close may be hiding all the answers.

items.name: (Sub) Southwestward
items.description: The Scouts search for a hole in the wall while Eren and the others learn that someone close may be hiding all the answers.

items.name: (Dub) Old Story
items.description: Historia and Erwin look back on their past, revealing shady actions taken by the government and a motivation for change.

items.name: (Sub) Old Story
items.description: Historia and Erwin look back on their past, revealing a shady government with a hidden agenda and inspiration for an uprising.

items.name: (Dub) The Door of Hope
items.description: Reiner reflects on his past, remembering what pushed him to become a Warrior and keep moving forward when all hope was lost.

items.name: (Sub) The Door of Hope
items.description: Reiner reflects on his past, remembering what pushed him to become a Warrior and keep moving forward when all hope was lost.

items.name: (Dub) Night of the Closing Ceremony / Humanity's Comeback, Part 2
items.description: Humanity's Comeback, Part 2, The: Annie proves her skill in a sparring session, Jan dreams of serving alongside the King, and graduation day brings shocking revelations - along with a sudden outbreak of violence!

items.name: (Sub) Night of the Closing Ceremony / Humanity's Comeback, Part 2
items.description: Annie proves her skill in a sparring session, Jan dreams of serving alongside the King, and graduation day brings shocking revelations - along with a sudden outbreak of violence!

items.name: (Dub) Soldier
items.description: Unarmed and overwhelmed by the Titan assault on the castle, the only hope for the Scouts may lie in a promise and a secret.

items.name: (Sub) Soldier
items.description: Unarmed and overwhelmed by the Titan assault on the castle, the only hope for the Scouts may lie in a promise and a secret.

items.name: (Dub) Trust
items.description: On the run and running out of time, the Scouts must entrust their lives to others if they plan on surviving.

items.name: (Sub) Trust
items.description: On the run and running out of time, the Scouts must entrust their lives to others if they plan on surviving.

items.name: (Dub) From One Hand to Another
items.description: A sudden visit from the Tybur family shakes up the Marleyan military. Meanwhile, Falco smuggles letters for a friend and helps two old comrades reunite.

items.name: (Sub) From One Hand to Another
items.description: A sudden visit from the Tybur family shakes up the Marleyan military. Meanwhile, Falco smuggles letters for a friend and helps two old comrades reunite.

items.name: (Dub) First Battle / Attack on Trost, Part 1
items.description: Eren faces off against the Colossal Titan after it appears out of nowhere and knocks a strategic hole in the Rose Wall gate. As Titans swarm the city, the newly graduated Cadets are called in to fight in brutal battle that won't be without casualties.

items.name: (Sub) First Battle / Attack on Trost, Part 1
items.description: Eren faces off against the Colossal Titan after it appears out of nowhere and knocks a strategic hole in the Rose Wall gate. As Titans swarm the city, the newly graduated Cadets are called in to fight in brutal battle that won't be without casualties.

items.name: (Dub) Historia
items.description: Utgard Castle comes crumbling down as Ymir desperately battles the Titans. Now, Christa must fulfill the promise they made long ago during winter training.

items.name: (Sub) Historia
items.description: Utgard Castle comes crumbling down as Ymir desperately battles the Titans. Now, Christa must fulfill the promise they made long ago during winter training.

items.name: (Dub) Reply
items.description: Erwin pleads his case for the Scouts to be spared, but an unforeseen announcement puts the fate of humanity at risk.

items.name: (Sub) Reply
items.description: Erwin pleads his case for the Scouts to be spared, but an unforeseen announcement puts the fate of humanity at risk.

items.name: (Dub) Declaration of War
items.description: While Willy Tybur reveals the truth in a shocking speech to the world, tensions rise behind the stage as Eren and Reiner meet face to face.

items.name: (Sub) Declaration of War
items.description: While Willy Tybur reveals the truth in a shocking speech to the world, tensions rise behind the stage as Eren and Reiner meet face to face.

items.name: (Dub) The World the Girl Saw / The Struggle for Trost: Part 2
items.description: World the Girl Saw: The Struggle for Trost, Part 2, The: Armin tries to cope with the loss of his friends and allies after Titans massacre his squad. Elsewhere in the city, Mikasa manages to take out several of the monsters, which brings back tragic memories of her past and the first time she met Eren.

items.name: (Sub) The World Seen by a Young Girl / Attack on Trost, Part 2
items.description: Armin tries to cope with the loss of his friends and allies after Titans massacre his squad. Elsewhere in the city, Mikasa manages to take out several of the monsters, which brings back tragic memories of her past and the first time she met Eren.

items.name: (Dub) Warrior
items.description: Following the battle, the Scouts regroup atop the wall only to find more questions than answers. Before they leave for Trost to get medical attention, Reiner must fulfill what he came to do.

items.name: (Sub) Warrior
items.description: Following the battle, the Scouts regroup atop the wall only to find more questions than answers. Before they leave for Trost to get medical attention, Reiner must fulfill what he came to do.

items.name: (Dub) Sin
items.description: While sins of the past reveal new truths, both sides prepare for the upcoming showdown before they run out of time.

items.name: (Sub) Sin
items.description: While sins of the past reveal new truths, both sides prepare for the upcoming showdown before they run out of time.

items.name: (Dub) The War Hammer Titan
items.description: Eren's rampage is thwarted by the War Hammer Titan whose tenacity leaves him stumped. With Marley's military joining the fight, he'll be hard-pressed to survive on his own.

items.name: (Sub) The War Hammer Titan
items.description: Eren's rampage is thwarted by the War Hammer Titan whose tenacity leaves him stumped. With Marley's military joining the fight, he'll be hard-pressed to survive on his own.

items.name: (Dub) The Tiniest of Blades / Attack on Trost, Part 3
items.description: After the retreat bell sounds, many cadets find themselves without enough fuel to scale the wall back to safety. Mikasa begins to lose hope once she hears of the deaths in Armin's squad.

items.name: (Sub) The Tiniest of Blades / Attack on Trost, Part 3
items.description: After the retreat bell sounds, many cadets find themselves without enough fuel to scale the wall back to safety. Mikasa begins to lose hope once she hears of the deaths in Armin's squad, but the appearance of a new type of Titan stokes her will to fight.

items.name: (Dub) Close Combat
items.description: With a new enemy revealed, Eren and the Scouts fight back using all the techniques at their disposal. However, the Armored and Colossal Titan have other plans in mind.

items.name: (Sub) Close Combat
items.description: With a new enemy revealed, Eren and the Scouts fight back using all the techniques at their disposal. However, the Armored and Colossal Titan have other plans in mind.

items.name: (Dub) Wish
items.description: As battle breaks out to prevent the ritual, Historia makes a shocking decision which leads to catastrophe.

items.name: (Sub) Wish
items.description: As battle breaks out to prevent the ritual, Historia makes a shocking decision which leads to catastrophe.

items.name: (Dub) Assault
items.description: The forces of Paradis begin their assault, but the Warriors stand their ground. As Marley troops close in around them, Eren struggles to break the War Hammer's defenses.

items.name: (Sub) Assault
items.description: The forces of Paradis begin their assault, but the Warriors stand their ground. As Marley troops close in around them, Eren struggles to break the War Hammer's defenses.

items.name: (Dub) I Can Hear His Heartbeat: The Struggle for Trost, Part 4
items.description: Armin comes up with a risky plan that pits Titan against Titan as the abandoned Cadets attempt to take back their headquarters. Getting into the building might be possible but getting out alive and refueled will mean facing more of the giants.

items.name: (Sub) I Can Hear His Heartbeat: The Struggle for Trost, Part 4
items.description: Armin comes up with a risky plan that pits Titan against Titan as the abandoned Cadets attempt to take back their headquarters. Getting into the building might be possible, but getting out alive and refueled will mean facing more of the giants.

items.name: (Dub) The Hunters
items.description: Without a way to pursue the Titans, the Scouts have no choice but to recuperate as they wait for reinforcements. But do they still have faith in Eren?

items.name: (Sub) The Hunters
items.description: Without a way to pursue the Titans, the Scouts have no choice but to recuperate as they wait for reinforcements. But do they still have faith in Eren?

items.name: (Dub) Outside the Walls of Orvud District
items.description: Outside the Walls of Orvud District: When everything falls apart, Eren must believe in himself to save his friends. But, Eren alone may not be enough to stop the impending doom.

items.name: (Sub) Outside the Walls of Orvud District
items.description: When everything falls apart, Eren must believe in himself to save his friends. But Eren alone may not be enough to stop the impending doom.

items.name: (Dub) Assassin's Bullet
items.description: With no Titans left to threaten their escape, the Scouts retreat on the airship. Determined to make them pay for trampling on her home, Gabi chases after with gun in hand.

items.name: (Sub) Assassin's Bullet
items.description: With no Titans left to threaten their escape, the Scouts retreat on the airship. Determined to make them pay for trampling on her home, Gabi chases after with gun in hand.

items.name: (Dub) What Happened to His Left Arm? / Attack On Trost Part 5
items.description: Whereabouts of His Left Arm: The Struggle for Trost, Part 5: A miraculous return is met with anger and fear. Cannons are fixed on Eren as he struggles to remember what happened to him inside the belly of a monster.

items.name: (Sub) What Happened to His Left Arm? / Attack On Trost Part 5
items.description: A miraculous return is met with anger and fear. Cannons are fixed on Eren as he struggles to remember what happened to him inside the belly of a monster and how he ended up humankind's enemy. One question is all that matters: is Eren human or Titan?

items.name: (Dub) Opening
items.description: The Scouts rally and charge in pursuit, but Reiner is not quite himself while the group is trapped in the giant forest until nightfall.

items.name: (Sub) Opening
items.description: The Scouts rally and charge in pursuit, but Reiner is not quite himself while the group is trapped in the giant forest until nightfall.

items.name: (Dub) Ruler of the Walls
items.description: Desperate to stop the approaching monstrosity, the Scouts resort to unconventional tactics before it destroys everything in its path.

items.name: (Sub) Ruler of the Walls
items.description: Desperate to stop the approaching monstrosity, the Scouts resort to unconventional tactics before it destroys everything in its path.

items.name: (Dub) Brave Volunteers
items.description: As Paradis deals with the aftermath of the raid on Liberio, Armin looks back into the past to meet the volunteer soldiers who reshaped their world.

items.name: (Sub) Brave Volunteers
items.description: As Paradis deals with the aftermath of the raid on Liberio, Armin looks back in the past to meeting the volunteer soldiers who reshaped their world.

items.name: (Dub) Response: The Struggle for Trost Part 6
items.description: Response: The Struggle for Trost Part 6: Cadets respond to Eren's terrifying transformation with doubt and fear as he struggles to understand it himself. If Armin can't talk the commander into using Eren's newfound powers for the good of humankind, all hope of stopping the Titans might be lost.

items.name: (Sub) The Response / Attack on Trost, Part 6
items.description: Cadets respond to Eren's terrifying transformation with doubt and fear as he struggles to understand it himself. If Armin can't talk the commander into using Eren's newfound powers for the good of humankind, all hope of stopping the Titans might be lost.

items.name: (Dub) Children
items.description: When their group finally flees, Ymir wonders whether she should lie or stay true to herself, even if it means ruining the lives and futures of those she cares about.

items.name: (Sub) Children
items.description: When their group finally flees, Ymir wonders whether she should lie or stay true to herself, even if it means ruining the lives and future of those she cares about.

items.name: (Dub) Friends
items.description: Kenny recalls the life which has brought him to death's door, but he gets to decide whether to live on or not.

items.name: (Sub) Friends
items.description: Kenny recalls the life which has brought him to death's door, but he gets to decide whether to live on or not.

items.name: (Dub) A Sound Argument
items.description: Two years ago, Paradis welcomed their first visitor, who was surprised to see one of its own; obtaining their help will be critical in a three-part plan to protect Paradis.

items.name: (Sub) A Sound Argument
items.description: Two years ago, Paradis welcomed their first visitor who was surprised to see one of their own. Obtaining their help will be critical in a three-part plan to protect Paradis.

items.name: (Dub) Idol / Attack On Trost, Part 7
items.description: Plans are created to use Eren's Titan powers to seal the hole in the wall in an attempt reclaim Trost. But with the government's bloodstained history and vocal dissenters in the military ranks, the biggest threat to humankind may not be the Titans.

items.name: (Sub) Idol / Attack on Trost, Part 7
items.description: Plans are created to use Eren's Titan powers to seal the hole in the wall in an attempt to reclaim Trost. But with the government's bloodstained history and vocal dissenters in the military ranks, the biggest threat to humankind may not be the Titans.

items.name: (Dub) Charge
items.description: While the recruits attempt to reason with Bertholdt, Commander Erwin charges forth in a desperate strategy to topple the Armored Titan.

items.name: (Sub) Charge
items.description: While the recruits attempt to reason with Bertholdt, Commander Erwin charges forth in a desperate strategy to topple the Armored Titan.

items.name: (Dub) Bystander
items.description: Having seen a glimpse of his father's past, Eren attempts to track down a man who might shed some light on his father's secrets.

items.name: (Sub) Bystander
items.description: Having seen a glimpse of his father's past, Eren attempts to track down a man who might shed some light on his father's secrets.

items.name: (Dub) Deceiver
items.description: Trapped on the world's most dangerous island, Falco and Gabi will do anything to survive; elsewhere, the public demands answers when it learns the savior of Paradis has been detained.

items.name: (Sub) Deceiver
items.description: Trapped on the world's most dangerous island, Falco and Gabi will do anything to survive. Elsewhere, the public demands answers when they learn the savior of Paradis has been detained.

items.name: (Dub) Flaw / Attack on Trost, Part 8
items.description: The plan to reclaim Trost falls apart when Eren's newfound powers turn him into a mindless giant.

items.name: (Sub) Flaw / Attack on Trost, Part 8
items.description: The plan to reclaim Trost falls apart when Eren's newfound powers turn him into a mindless giant. As Titans continue to swarm the city, it's up to Armin and Mikasa to make sure the cadets massacred during the mission haven't died in vain.

items.name: (Dub) Scream
items.description: Eren's confrontation with a smiling Titan raises questions about his powers, but any answers will come at a cost.

items.name: (Sub) Scream
items.description: Eren's confrontation with a smiling Titan raises questions about his powers, but any answers will come at a cost.

items.name: (Dub) Night of the Battle to Retake the Wall
items.description: The Scouts enjoy a feast before retaking Wall Maria. They'll soon uncover what's hidden within the basement, once and for all.

items.name: (Sub) Night of the Battle to Retake the Wall
items.description: The Scouts enjoy a feast before retaking Wall Maria. They'll soon uncover what's hidden within the basement, once and for all.

items.name: (Dub) Guides
items.description: While Hange and Pyxis piece together Zeke's true intentions, tension builds outside HQ where Armin and Mikasa plead for permission to speak with Eren.

items.name: (Sub) Guides
items.description: While Hange and Pyxis piece together Zeke's true intentions, tension builds outside HQ where Armin and Mikasa plead for permission to speak with Eren.

items.name: (Dub) Primal Desire / Attack on Trost Part 9
items.description: Jean takes desperate measures to replace his broken maneuvering device. Meanwhile, Eren is able to plug the hole in the wall thanks to the help of his fellow cadets, but the cost of humanity's first victory against the Titans will be gigantic.

items.name: (Sub) Primal Desire / Attack on Trost Part 9
items.description: Jean takes desperate measures to replace his broken maneuvering device. Meanwhile, Eren is able to plug the hole in the wall thanks to the help of his fellow cadets, but the cost of humanity's first victory against the Titans will be gigantic.

items.name: (Dub) The Town Where Everything Began
items.description: The operation to retake Wall Maria commences in Shiganshina, the town where everything began. But when the Scouts arrive, something seems very wrong.

items.name: (Sub) The Town Where Everything Began
items.description: The operation to retake Wall Maria commences in Shiganshina, the town where everything began. But when the Scouts arrive, something seems very wrong.

items.name: (Dub) Children of the Forest
items.description: Gabi and Falco seek out a fellow Marleyan who's surprised to see Warrior candidates. The truth of what happened at Ragako may shed some light on Zeke's secret plans.

items.name: (Sub) Children of the Forest
items.description: Gabi and Falco seek out a fellow Marleyan who's surprised to see Warrior candidates. The truth of what happened at Ragako may shed some light on Zeke's secret plans.

items.name: (Dub) Still Can’t Look Him in the Eye / Eve of the Counteroffensive, Part 1
items.description: A special military tribunal will decide Eren's fate. The Military Police calls for his execution while the Scout Regiment argues that he is a powerful resource for humankind, and Mikasa is put on the spot when asked about the events of the Trost mission.

items.name: (Sub) Still Can't Look Him in the Eye/Eve of the Counteroffensive, Part 1
items.description: A special military tribunal will decide Eren's fate. The Military Police calls for his execution while the Scout Regiment argues that he is a powerful resource for humankind, and Mikasa is put on the spot when asked about the events of the Trost mission.

items.name: (Dub) Thunder Spears
items.description: Against a rush of enemies, the Scouts scramble to defend their horses. But despite falling into a trap, they have their own surprise for the Armored Titan.

items.name: (Sub) Thunder Spears
items.description: Against a rush of enemies, the Scouts scramble to defend their horses. But despite falling into a trap, they have their own surprise for the Armored Titan.

items.name: (Dub) Savagery
items.description: Armin and Mikasa speak with Eren, but are astounded by what he says. In the forest, Levi considers feeding the Beast Titan to someone new, but Zeke has other plans in mind.

items.name: (Sub) Savagery
items.description: Armin and Mikasa speak with Eren, but are astounded by what he says. In the forest, Levi considers feeding the Beast Titan to someone new, but Zeke has other plans in mind.

items.name: (Dub) Special Operations Squad: Eve of the Counterattack, Part 2
items.description: The Scout Regiment moves Eren to an old abandoned castle where he will continue his training. Hanzi visits and reveals that she's been putting two captured Titans through a series of tests and trials-experiments that she wants Eren's help with.

items.name: (Sub) Special Tactical Force/Eve of the Counteroffensive, Part 2
items.description: The Scout Regiment moves Eren to an old abandoned castle where he will continue his training. Hanzi visits and reveals that she's been putting two captured Titans through a series of tests and trials - experiments that she wants Eren's help with.

items.name: (Dub) Descent
items.description: Though their Thunder Spears prove effective, the Scouts' celebration is short-lived as disaster descends upon Shiganshina.

items.name: (Sub) Descent
items.description: Though their Thunder Spears prove effective, the Scouts' celebration is short-lived as disaster descends upon Shiganshina.

items.name: (Dub) Sole Salvation
items.description: A look into Zeke's past shows his struggle to become a Warrior. His plans to end the suffering of all Eldians stems from a chance friendship made in his youth.

items.name: (Sub) Sole Salvation
items.description: A look into Zeke's past shows his struggle to become a Warrior. His plans to end the suffering of all Eldians stems from a chance friendship made in his youth.

items.name: (Dub) What Should I Do Now / Eve of the Counteroffensive, Part 3
items.description: Everyone is a suspect in the investigation to find out who killed the two test-subject Titans. Meanwhile, the Cadets pick which corps they'll be joining, but after the harrowing events in the Trost attack, many are uncertain which branch to choose.

items.name: (Sub) What Should I Do Now / Eve of the Counteroffensive, Part 3
items.description: Everyone is a suspect in the investigation to find out who killed the two test-subject Titans. Meanwhile, the Cadets pick which corps they'll be joining, but after the harrowing events in the Trost attack, many are uncertain which branch to choose.

items.name: (Dub) Perfect Game
items.description: While one front in the battle is rained on by flames, the other is battered by boulders. With no way out, the Scouts are forced to fight or die trying.

items.name: (Sub) Perfect Game
items.description: While one front in the battle is rained on by flames, the other is battered by boulders. With no way out, the Scouts are forced to fight or die trying.

items.name: (Dub) Above and Below
items.description: With the Jaegerists now in charge, Zeke's master plan is revealed. But before it is put in motion, Eren recruits help to flush out any invaders in their midst.

items.name: (Sub) Above and Below
items.description: With the Jaegerists now in charge, Zeke's master plan is revealed. But before it is put in motion, Eren recruits help to flush out any invaders in their midst.

items.name: (Dub) Female Titan / The 57th Expedition, Part 1
items.description: As the Scout Regiment begins its push toward Shiganshina, they encounter an intelligent Female Titan unlike any they've seen before. When Armin hypothesizes that it's really a human that's been turned into a Titan, he, Jean, and Reiner attempt to stop it.

items.name: (Sub) Female Titan / The 57th Expedition, Part 1
items.description: As the Scout Regiment begins its push toward Shiganshina, they encounter an intelligent Female Titan unlike any they've seen before. When Armin hypothesizes that it's really a human that's been turned into a Titan, he, Jean, and Reiner attempt to stop it.

items.name: (Dub) Hero
items.description: As Erwin's heroic charge buys Levi time to confront the Beast Titan, Armin comes up with a plan of his own that lays it all on the line.

items.name: (Sub) Hero
items.description: As Erwin's heroic charge buys Levi time to confront the Beast Titan, Armin comes up with a plan of his own that lays it all on the line.

items.name: (Dub) Judgment
items.description: Caught off guard by Marley's surprise attack, Eren fends off their Titans alone. As the battle rages on above, the Scouts consider Eren's motives from the underground dungeons.

items.name: (Sub) Judgment
items.description: Caught off guard by Marley's surprise attack, Eren fends off their Titans alone. As the battle rages on above, the Scouts consider Eren's motives from the underground dungeons.

items.name: (Dub) Forest of Giant Trees/The 57th Expedition, Part 2
items.description: As the Female Titan continues to tear its way through the Scout Regiment, Levi makes a bold decision to split the ranks and send Eren and the supply wagons through a huge forest. Is his strategy genius, or does it spell certain death for the scouts?

items.name: (Sub) Forest of Giant Trees/The 57th Expedition, Part 2
items.description: As the Female Titan continues to tear its way through the Scout Regiment, Levi makes a bold decision to split the ranks and send Eren and the supply wagons through a huge forest. Is his strategy genius, or does it spell certain death for the scouts?

items.name: (Dub) Midnight Sun
items.description: While picking up the pieces from the costly battle, tensions rise when deciding which of the wounded Scouts to use the single syringe on.

items.name: (Sub) Midnight Sun
items.description: While picking up the pieces from the costly battle, tensions rise when deciding which of the wounded Scouts to use the single syringe on.

items.name: (Dub) Sneak Attack
items.description: The Beast Titan joins the fray, but General Magath is determined to take him down. Meanwhile, with the city in flames, Colt and Gabi rush to rescue Falco who's held captive by the Jaegerists.

items.name: (Sub) Sneak Attack
items.description: The Beast Titan joins the fray, but General Magath is determined to take him down. Meanwhile, with the city in flames, Colt and Gabi rush to rescue Falco who's held captive by the Jaegerists.

items.name: (Dub) Bite/The 57th Expedition, Part 3
items.description: The 57th Exterior Scouting Mission, Part 3: A memory of Eren testing out his Titan powers sheds new light on how his abilities work. As the Female Titan continues to slaughter members of the Scout Regiment, Eren is faced with a difficult decisions: does he trust his teammates or act out on his own?

items.name: (Sub) Bite/The 57th Expedition, Part 3
items.description: A memory of Eren testing out his Titan powers sheds new light on how his abilities work. As the Female Titan continues to slaughter members of the Scout Regiment, Eren is faced with a difficult decisions: does he trust his teammates or act out on his own?

items.name: (Dub) The Basement
items.description: The secrets hidden in Grisha's basement await in the ruins of Shiganshina. There, the Scouts hope to find answers to the world worth more than the price they paid.

items.name: (Sub) The Basement
items.description: The secrets hidden in Grisha's basement await in the ruins of Shiganshina. There, the Scouts hope to find answers to the world worth more than the price they paid.

items.name: (Dub) Two Brothers
items.description: Colt pleads with Zeke to not use his scream and turn Falco into a Titan. All the while, soldiers and Titans clash in battle as Eren struggles to make contact with his brother.

items.name: (Sub) Two Brothers
items.description: Colt pleads with Zeke to not use his scream and turn Falco into a Titan. All the while, soldiers and Titans clash in battle as Eren struggles to make contact with his brother.

items.name: (Dub) Erwin Smith/The 57th Expedition, Part 4
items.description: Erwin Smith: The 57th Exterior Scouting Mission, Part 4: The Female Titan has been captured, and it's Erwin's goal to find out who the human is lurking inside it. Meanwhile, the Scouts realize that the reason Levi told no one about their true mission outside the wall is because there is a spy among their ranks.

items.name: (Sub) Erwin Smith/The 57th Expedition, Part 4
items.description: The Female Titan has been captured, and it's Erwin's goal to find out who the human is lurking inside it. Meanwhile, the Scouts realize that the reason Levi told no one about their true mission outside the wall is because there is a spy among them.

items.name: (Dub) That Day
items.description: A look into Grisha's memories shows Eren the many secrets his father was hiding, including one which led to his mother's demise.

items.name: (Sub) That Day
items.description: A look into Grisha's memories shows Eren the many secrets his father was hiding, including one which led to his mother's demise.

items.name: (Dub) Memories of the Future
items.description: Zeke takes Eren through Grisha's memories to show him how he's been brainwashed. But in doing so, Zeke discovers something about Eren that he never knew.

items.name: (Sub) Memories of the Future
items.description: Zeke takes Eren through Grisha's memories to show him how he's been brainwashed. But in doing so, Zeke discovers something about Eren that he never knew.

items.name: (Dub) Iron Hammer/The 57th Expedition, Part 5
items.description: The 57th Exterior Scouting Mission, Part 5: A traitor has infiltrated the Scout Regiment, destroying their ranks from within.

items.name: (Sub) Iron Hammer/The 57th Expedition, Part 5
items.description: A traitor has infiltrated the Scout Regiment, destroying their ranks from within. When cornered, she once again takes the form of the Female Titan - but this time, Eren's not going to let her get away without one insanely brutal fight.

items.name: (Dub) Attack Titan
items.description: Eren learns how all paths connect in the story that his father began. If Grisha is to pay for his sins, he must fight for freedom and take a stand.

items.name: (Sub) Attack Titan
items.description: Eren learns how all paths connect in the story that his father began. If Grisha is to pay for his sins, he must fight for freedom and take a stand.

items.name: (Dub) From You, 2,000 Years Ago
items.description: For 2,000 years, the Founder Ymir has been waiting--a slave to those with royal blood. However, Eren's yearning for freedom gives her a choice that could shake things up.

items.name: (Sub) From You, 2,000 Years Ago
items.description: For 2,000 years, the Founder Ymir has been waiting--a slave to those with royal blood. However, Eren's yearning for freedom gives her a choice that could shake things up.

items.name: (Dub) The Defeated: The 57th Exterior Scouting Mission, Part 6
items.description: After watching Eren get swallowed by the Female Titan, Mikasa and Levi follow the brutal monster in the hopes that he's still alive inside her. As the Scout Regiment tries to recover from the devastating losses of the operation, emotions run high.

items.name: (Sub) The Defeated: The 57th Exterior Scouting Mission, Part 6
items.description: After watching Eren get swallowed by the Female Titan, Mikasa and Levi follow the brutal monster in the hopes that he's still alive inside her. As the Scout Regiment tries to recover from the devastating losses of the operation, emotions run high.

items.name: (Dub) The Other Side of the Wall
items.description: Though it's met with hope and despair, the truth is made public. The Scouts then venture beyond the walls to see if it's everything they dreamed of.

items.name: (Sub) The Other Side of the Wall
items.description: Though it's met with hope and despair, the truth is made public. The Scouts then venture beyond the walls to see if it's everything they dreamed of.

items.name: (Dub) Thaw
items.description: With no walls left on the island and Shiganshina full of Titans, the Scouts must battle their former comrades. In the midst of it all, Gabi is determined to find and rescue Falco at whatever cost.

items.name: (Sub) Thaw
items.description: With no walls left on the island and Shiganshina full of Titans, the Scouts must battle their former comrades. In the midst of it all, Gabi is determined to find and rescue Falco at whatever cost.

items.name: (Dub) Smile/Stohess District Raid, Part 1
items.description: After the failed scouting expedition, Eren and his superiors are summoned to the capital. Annie witnesses just how deep corruption runs in the Military Police, and agrees to join Armin in a plot to defy the government - but nothing is really as it seems.

items.name: (Sub) Smile/Stohess District Raid, Part 1
items.description: After the failed scouting expedition, Eren and his superiors are summoned to the capital. Annie witnesses just how deep corruption runs in the Military Police, and agrees to join Armin in a plot to defy the government - but nothing is really as it seems.

items.name: (Dub) Sunset
items.description: The rumbling is set in motion once all hardening is undone, but this also sets Annie free. As the Jaegerists take control of the island, Conny races towards Ragako to feed Falco to his Titan mother.

items.name: (Sub) Sunset
items.description: The rumbling is set in motion once all hardening is undone, but this also sets Annie free. As the Jaegerists take control of the island, Conny races towards Ragako to feed Falco to his Titan mother.

items.name: (Dub) Compassion/Stohess District Raid, Part 2
items.description: When the identity of the Female Titan is finally revealed, she goes on a rampage within Wall Sina. Eren is hesitant to fight her, but Armin and Mikasa throw themselves into of the battle in a desperate attempt to stop the towering monster.

items.name: (Sub) Compassion / Stohess District Raid, Part 2
items.description: When the identity of the Female Titan is finally revealed, she goes on a rampage within Wall Sina. Eren is hesitant to fight her, but Armin and Mikasa throw themselves into of the battle in a desperate attempt to stop the towering monster.

items.name: (Dub) Pride
items.description: Upon reaching Ragako, Conny hatches a plan to trick Falco into being eaten by his mother. Elsewhere, hero of the Eldian Empire, Jean, is to execute Yelena and Onyankopon for their crimes against humanity.

items.name: (Sub) Pride
items.description: Upon reaching Ragako, Conny hatches a plan to trick Falco into being eaten by his mother. Elsewhere, hero of the Eldian Empire, Jean, is to execute Yelena and Onyankopon for their crimes against humanity.

items.name: (Dub) Wall: Assault on Stohess, Part 3
items.description: Eren goes head-to-head with the Female Titan in a fight that demolishes the Stohess District inside Wall Sina. As the casualties skyrocket and Annie tries to escape over the wall, Erwin must deal with the consequences of his plan.

items.name: (Sub) The Wall/Stohess District Raid, Part 3
items.description: Eren goes head-to-head with the Female Titan in a fight that demolishes the Stohess District inside Wall Sina. As the number of casualties skyrockets and Annie tries to escape over the wall, Erwin must deal with the consequences of his plan.

items.name: (Dub) Night of the End
items.description: Deep in the forest, an unlikely rabble of Marley stragglers and island fugitives attempt to set their hatred aside and talk around a campfire without killing each other.

items.name: (Sub) Night of the End
items.description: Deep in the forest, an unlikely rabble of Marley stragglers and island fugitives attempt to set their hatred aside and talk around a campfire without killing each other.

items.name: (Dub) Traitor
items.description: The Azumabito's flying boat is guarded by a port full of Jaegerists, but the Scouts are reluctant to kill their former friends. If they wish to avoid bloodshed, they can't afford their plan to go wrong.

items.name: (Sub) Traitor
items.description: The Azumabito's flying boat is guarded by a port full of Jaegerists, but the Scouts are reluctant to kill their former friends. If they wish to avoid bloodshed, they can't afford their plan to go wrong.

items.name: (Dub) Retrospective
items.description: For the flying boat to take off, the mechanics need half a day to service it. Knowing they'll never last that long with Jaegerist reinforcements on the way, the crew is forced to change their plans.

items.name: (Sub) Retrospective
items.description: For the flying boat to take off, the mechanics need half a day to service it. Knowing they'll never last that long with Jaegerist reinforcements on the way, the crew is forced to change their plans.

items.name: (Dub) The Dawn of Humanity
items.description: Regardless of where it all began, Eren commits to his path of destruction during the Scouts' first visit to the Marleyan mainland, leaving Mikasa to wonder if things could've been different.

items.name: (Sub) The Dawn of Humanity
items.description: Regardless of where it all began, Eren commits to his path of destruction during the Scouts' first visit to the Marleyan mainland, leaving Mikasa to wonder if things could've been different.

items.name: (Sub) The Final Chapters Special 1
items.description: As the rumbling advances, the remaining members of the Scout Regiment race against the clock with their Marleyan and Azumabito allies to catch up to Eren and stop the rumbling before the rest of the world is crushed under the Wall Titans' feet.

items.name: Attack on Titan Final Season Part 2 - PV 2
items.description: Attack on Titan Final Season trailer

items.name: (Sub) Since That Day
items.description: In the wake of the mission to take back Trost, Eren recollects the events that led to humanity's current state - starting with the day the Colossal Titan first appeared in Shiganshina.

model.name: Attack on Titan
model.description: From the director of Death Note comes Attack on Titan. Many years ago, humanity was forced to retreat behind the towering walls of a fortified city to escape the massive, man-eating Titans that roamed the land outside their fortress. This is their story.

detailEntity.name: Attack on Titan
detailEntity.description: From the director of Death Note comes Attack on Titan. Many years ago, humanity was forced to retreat behind the towering walls of a fortified city to escape the massive, man-eating Titans that roamed the land outside their fortress. This is their story.
